name: Ultimatum 30 tours
note:
<JS On Add State>
 if (!target.enemy().traits.filter(x => x.code == 14).find(x => x.dataId == 4)) {
  target.addState(152);
 }
 target.removeState(154);
</JS On Add State>
<JS On Expire State>
target.addState(1);
</JS On Expire State>

name: Ultimatum 50 tours
note:
<JS On Add State>
 if (!(target.mhp > 10000 && target.enemy().traits.filter(x => x.code == 14).find(x => x.dataId == 4))) {
  target.addState(153);
 }
 target.removeState(155);
</JS On Add State>
<JS On Expire State>
target.addState(1);
</JS On Expire State>

name: Ultimatum 100 tours
note:
<JS On Add State>
 if (!target.hasState(84)) {
  target.addState(154);
 }
 if (target.hasState(85)) {
  target.removeState(155);
 }
</JS On Add State>
<JS On Expire State>
target.addState(1);
</JS On Expire State>
